sentences.english: My father is a postman.
sentences.chinese: 我的父亲是一名邮递员。

sentences.english: He works hard every day.
sentences.chinese: 他每天辛勤工作。

sentences.english: He carries a heavy bag along the mountain road to deliver letters.
sentences.chinese: 他背着沉重的包沿着山路送信。

sentences.english: It is a touching thing to watch.
sentences.chinese: 那是一幅感人的画面。

sentences.english: He is a handsome man, but very strict.
sentences.chinese: 他是一个英俊的男人，但非常严格。

sentences.english: He wants me to follow his rules.
sentences.chinese: 他希望我遵守他的规矩。

sentences.english: "Stay serious about your studies," he always says.
sentences.chinese: "对学习要认真,"他总是这样说。

sentences.english: But I know he cares about me deeply.
sentences.chinese: 但我知道他深深地关心着我。

sentences.english: Last week, I was absent from school.
sentences.chinese: 上周，我没去上学。

sentences.english: I was sick with a bad disease.
sentences.chinese: 我生病了，得了一种严重的病。

sentences.english: My father was seldom away from my side.
sentences.chinese: 父亲很少离开我的身边。

sentences.english: He hugged me and said, "Don't cry. Everything will be okay."
sentences.chinese: 他拥抱我说："别哭。一切都会好起来的。"

sentences.english: I have many memories of my father.
sentences.chinese: 我有很多关于父亲的记忆。

sentences.english: When I was young, he would pick me up from school.
sentences.chinese: 当我还小的时候，他会去学校接我。

sentences.english: We would walk across the street together.
sentences.chinese: 我们会一起穿过街道。

sentences.english: Sometimes he would buy me a special treat.
sentences.chinese: 有时他会给我买特别的零食。

sentences.english: "Your father serves you with all his heart," my mother once said.
sentences.chinese: "你父亲全心全意地服务你们,"母亲曾经说。

sentences.english: "That is the result of his love."
sentences.chinese: "那是他爱的结果。"

sentences.english: One day, my father told me a story.
sentences.chinese: 有一天，父亲给我讲了一个故事。

sentences.english: "When I was young, I wanted to be an actor," he said.
sentences.chinese: "我年轻的时候，想成为一名演员,"他说。

sentences.english: "But life has many changes.
sentences.chinese: "但生活有很多变化。

sentences.english: I became a postman instead.
sentences.chinese: 我成了一名邮递员。

sentences.english: Now I protect this family.
sentences.chinese: 现在我保护这个家庭。

sentences.english: That is my position and I am proud of it."
sentences.chinese: 这是我的位置，我为此感到骄傲。"

sentences.english: Later, he asked me to help pull the bright red trailer in our yard.
sentences.chinese: 后来，他让我帮忙把院子里鲜红色的拖车拉走。

sentences.english: It was heavy, but I refused to move.
sentences.chinese: 它很重，但我拒绝移动。

sentences.english: "The matter is simple," he said.
sentences.chinese: "事情很简单,"他说。

sentences.english: "You must learn to work hard."
sentences.chinese: "你必须学会努力工作。"

sentences.english: I thought about his words.
sentences.chinese: 我想着他的话。

sentences.english: The power to change comes from within.
sentences.chinese: 改变的力量来自内心。

sentences.english: I decided to listen to him and work harder in school.
sentences.chinese: 我决定听他的话，在学校里更加努力。

sentences.english: Now when I see him smile, I feel joy in my heart.
sentences.chinese: 现在看到他微笑时，我心里感到快乐。

sentences.english: His love is like a warm hug that never ends.
sentences.chinese: 他的爱就像一个永不结束的温暖拥抱。
